channel.title: Spell requirements
channel.description: How would i change a spells rune requirements? For example..a teleport needs x law, x air, x earth. But i want it to be 0 law, 0 air, 0 water. This should make it show as blue? am i correct? if so is it possible to change it? I'm using a delta base.

item.title: Spell requirements
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

xD I’m not a retard I just made construction into my server, have a look if you want : funnerscape.tk
I was just wandering if it was possible to get the teleport icon to show as blue, not faded. thanks for your help though, I already knew how to do that

Read full topic

item.title: Spell requirements
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

delete the whole line for example

if (c.playerHasItem(555, 2)) {

change it to this

instead of

if (c.playerHasItem(555, 2)) {

just make sure you take out the else. if you donlt understand this then just do what caveman said.

Read full topic

item.title: Spell requirements
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

funnerscape:

How would i change a spells rune requirements? For example…a teleport needs x law, x air, x earth. But i want it to be 0 law, 0 air, 0 water. This should make it show as blue? am i correct? if so is it possible to change it? I’m using a delta base.

search for: && c.playerHasItem in your clickingmost.java. you’ll see it saying taking away 554,1 for example, change it to 0. did this help?

Read full topic
